Hey Heath,

Can we please limit RHS text here to the first paragraph. Also is there any way we can introduce renders on LHS like we do with our other products? We probably won't be releasing a booklet for doug.



Button for 'View details' looks good although we will still need to carry across our standard acoustic art details to include:

The Acoufelt Acoustic Art project comprises reproductions of hand-selected and unique works of art by contemporary artists, printed on acoustic panels. Achieving an NRC of 0.75, these pieces are the perfect modular product for spaces requiring a more flexible sound solution.

Note: Every piece of Acoustic Art is offered with a black frame. Click 'View Dimensions' below for individual artwork dimensions.

Note: Each purchase is made to order with an approximate 8-10 week delivery time from date of order to your region. A shipping tracking number will be provided to track and trace at the point of dispatch.



On the dimensions ^ we can remove the ratios as that's just for internal purposes. Just realised we also need to add inches too ☹ see below.

@glen can you please work on this one, thanks!

Hey Heath,

We have a new acoustic artist to add to the mix! His name is Doug Wittnebel.

We'll therefore be needing to create a new product page for his artworks, add his portrait to the acoustic artist landing page AND create a News piece announcing him as the 2020 acoustic artist.

His artworks, renders for each artwork, his artist portrait/photograph, and his artist News announcement copy and artist bio/copy for the website can all be found here:

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/d8uoxitqb82zyu9/AAD4TyR-3-4VIOEMKMZFAxOQa?dl=0

I've only included a short amount of bio copy as the current copy we have for each artist at the moment is too long: see below.



I'd also like to add the renders to this section here:



Can we also please make this 'link' more visible? Perhaps we turn it into a button instead?
